text: The Norfolk Admirals were an American professional ice hockey team that played from 2000 until 2015. They played in the American Hockey League and were the farm team of the Tampa Bay Lightning of the NHL. They played their home games in Norfolk, Virginia at the Norfolk Scope. Their ECHL affiliate team was the Florida Everblades. ==Other websites== *Norfolk Admirals Official Site Category:2000 establishments in the United States Category:2015 disestablishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Virginia Category:Defunct American Hockey League teams Category:Chicago Blackhawks minor league affiliates Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Tampa Bay Lightning Category:Sports in Norfolk, Virginia
title: Norfolk Admirals (AHL)
